channel.title: 经济学人
channel.description: 这是一个追踪经济学人news的种子

item.title:
弗拉基米尔-普京不仅在与乌克兰作战，也在与自己的人民作战。
对于俄罗斯总统来说，战争始终是为了通过改变国外状况来确保其国内地位👇。
item.description:
Vladimir Putin is fighting not just Ukraine, but his own people.

For Russia’s president the war has always been about securing his position at home by changing conditions abroad econ.st/49DEXum 👇

item.title: 俄罗斯间谍搞砸了弗拉基米尔-普京的战争准备工作，随后被大批驱逐出欧洲。但《经济学人》发表的新证据表明，他们又回来了--而且比以往任何时候都更危险 👇
item.description: Russian spies botched preparations for Vladimir Putin’s war and were then expelled from Europe en masse. But new evidence published by The Economist suggests they are back—and more dangerous than ever econ.st/42Jc7qg 👇

item.title: 在 "智慧 "节目中@kcsalmon探究非洲 "抨击诗歌 "的兴起--以及这种媒介如何让女性说出她们原本不敢说的话
item.description: On “The Intelligence” @kcsalmon looks into Africa’s rise in “slam poetry”—and how the medium allows women to say what they would otherwise dare not say econ.st/49B8jJG

item.title: 多年来，人们纷纷逃离旧金山，犯罪猖獗，学校条件恶劣，如今，旧金山正在经历一场复兴。@alice_fulwood, @birdyword 和 @TomLeeDevlin 将在本周的 "Money Talks "播客中探讨其原因。
item.description: After years of people fleeing in droves, rampant crime and poor schools, San Francisco is experiencing a revival. @alice_fulwood, @birdyword and @TomLeeDevlin investigate why on this week’s “Money Talks” podcast econ.st/3SKhb96 👇

item.title: 11 月，美国人将选出他们的下一任总统。经济学人》正在追踪这场角逐。关注最新民调，阅读关于两位主要候选人的简短指南，并标记关键的选举日历日期👇。
item.description: In November Americans will elect their next president. The Economist is tracking the contest. Follow the latest polls, read short guides on the two main candidates, and mark key electoral-calendar dates econ.st/3uvVS3f 👇

item.title: "信任已经流失，给中国经济增长带来严重后果"。在 "智库 "节目中，我们将探讨信心为何会从一个曾经不可阻挡的市场中消退。收听播客： 👇
item.description: “Trust has seeped away, with severe consequences for China's growth.” On “The Intelligence”, why confidence has faded from a once-unstoppable market. Listen to the podcast: econ.st/49DpMBq 👇

item.title: 在 "奇妙的国度 "节目中，以色列人以开玩笑的方式度过创伤。在这个精辟的喜剧节目中，除了加沙人的痛苦之外，似乎没有什么是不允许的👇。
item.description: On “A Wonderful Country”, Israelis joke their way through trauma. Nothing appears off limits on the incisive comedy show, except for Gazans’ pain econ.st/49DG79m 👇

item.title:
在我们提供巨无霸汉堡指数的近 40 年里，美国汉堡的价格增长了两倍多。在同一时期，好市多的热狗加饮料套餐一直保持在 1.50 美元。
这就是深受消费者喜爱的零售商背后的秘密： 👇
item.description:
In the nearly 40 years that we have served up our Big Mac index, the price of the burger in America has more than tripled. In that same period the hot-dog-and-drink combo at Costco has held at $1.50.

This is the secret behind the beloved retailer: econ.st/3uyszgp 👇

item.title: 实验室培育的肉是一种错误的牛排吗？意大利是这么认为的。意大利政府正试图禁止这种肉🥩。
item.description: Is lab-grown meat a mis-steak? Italy thinks so. Its government is trying to ban it econ.st/3UE1QJZ 🥩

item.title: 今天的 "情报 "节目：习近平对市场控制力的下滑、非洲粗口女诗人的崛起，以及为什么多项目运动员变得如此罕见。收听每日播客： 🎧
item.description: Today on “The Intelligence”: Xi Jinping’s slipping control over the markets, the rise of Africa’s foul-mouthed female poets and why multi-sport athletes got so rare. Listen to the daily podcast: econ.st/3UMWyvJ 🎧

item.title: 大张旗鼓地重申现行法律似乎是弥合执政者与被统治者之间分歧的良策。然而，"禁止强硬主义 "是英国政治中两种弊病的症状：👇...
item.description: Reasserting existing laws in a loud voice may seem like a benign way to bridge the gap between governing and governed. Yet ban-it-harderism is a symptom of two malaises in British politics: econ.st/4bDYnkI 👇

item.title: 夕阳西下，曼哈顿中城灯火通明，工人们在这里忙碌着，夹杂在一片黑色之间。我们应该如何担心商业地产？ 👇
item.description: As the sun sets on midtown Manhattan, floors bright with lights, where workers potter about, sit sandwiched between swathes of black. How worried should we be about commercial property? econ.st/3SzRkRi 👇

item.title:
观看一个实际席位的效忠变化，生动地预示着下一次大选时在议员自己的地盘上可能会发生什么。
这就是为什么英国保守党会对金斯伍德和威灵伯勒的结果感到绝望👇。
item.description:
Watching an actual seat change allegiance is a vivid sign of what might happen on an MP’s own turf at the next general election.

This is why Britain’s Conservative Party will despair over the results in Kingswood and Wellingborough econ.st/3SECglr 👇

item.title: 能源转型需要大量金属。但矿业公司却不愿投资。世界矿商为何如此吝啬？ 👇
item.description: The energy transition requires vast quantities of metals. But mining firms are reluctant to invest. Why are the world’s miners so stingy? econ.st/4bH0WCs 👇

item.title: 您应该把所有积蓄都投入股票吗？在今年初股市表现如此强劲之后，全仓股票的论调又出现了👇。
item.description: Should you put all your savings in stocks? The argument for going all in on equities has returned after such a strong start to the year for stockmarkets econ.st/42JvKye 👇

item.title:
对于保守的意大利人来说，托尔金的故事提供了一种鼓舞人心的精神，并提供了 "神话、社区、荣誉[和]牺牲"。
1843 》杂志深入探讨了奇幻文学与意大利极右翼的奇特历史
照片：Mari Fouz玛丽-福兹
item.description:
For conservative Italians J. R. R. Tolkien’s tales provide an inspirational ethos and offer “myth, community, honour [and] sacrifice”.

1843 magazine delves into the curious history of fantasy literature and the Italian far-right econ.st/4bJ9Oaz

Photos: Mari Fouz

item.title:
意大利文化部长称赞 J.R.R. 托尔金是 "一位坚定的天主教徒，他推崇传统和个人所属社区的价值......一位真正的保守主义者"。
1843 杂志调查了意大利极右翼为何痴迷于奇幻书籍
item.description:
Italy’s culture minister extols J.R.R. Tolkien as “a staunch Catholic who exalted the value of tradition and of the community to which one belongs…a true conservative.”

1843 magazine investigates why the Italian far-right are obsessed with fantasy books econ.st/3wtYH5a

item.title: 要填补美国留下的空间，欧洲需要做的不仅仅是增加国防开支。欧洲必须重新考虑军事力量的性质、核威慑的作用以及军事结构的影响。
item.description: For Europe to fill the space left by America it would need to do more than simply raise defence spending. It will have to reconsider the nature of military power, the role of nuclear deterrence and the implications of military structure econ.st/3wiwSg9 👇

item.title: 成功的工作场所通常以良好的沟通为特征。但是，良好的沟通往往与一种特殊技能混为一谈：有说服力的演讲👇。
item.description: Successful workplaces are usually characterised by good communication. But being a good communicator is too often conflated with one particular skill: speaking persuasively econ.st/49EtTNs 👇

item.title: 新的研究表明，在茶树中引入适当的微生物有可能创造出新的风味，同时还能减少农业污染。这应该是每个人都喜欢的一杯茶 ☕
item.description: New research suggests that introducing the right microbes to tea plants could have the potential to create new flavours while also reducing agricultural pollution. That should be everyone’s cup of tea econ.st/49zrlQQ ☕

item.title:
经过十年的战争，联合国认为也门的人道主义危机是世界上最严重的危机之一。
也门 3300 万人口中有一半以上需要援助才能生存。但胡塞武装在其西北部的地盘上阻碍了援助物资的流动👇。
item.description:
After a decade of war, the UN reckons that the humanitarian crisis in Yemen is one of the world’s worst.

Over half of its 33m people need aid to survive. But across their realm in the north-west the Houthis hinder aid flows econ.st/49xIdHu 👇

item.title: 美国陆军的未来在欧洲还是亚洲？它不可能同时在欧洲和亚洲发动战争 👇。
item.description: Does the US Army’s future lie in Europe or Asia? It could not wage wars in both at the same time econ.st/48n2QFq 👇

item.title: 经济学人》发表的新证据显示，克里姆林宫的情报机构已经从过去两年的错误中吸取了教训
item.description: New evidence, published by The Economist, shows that the Kremlin’s intelligence agencies have learned from their mistakes over the past two years econ.st/42NtiqB

item.title:
去年，欧洲做出了一个非正统的决定，在冬季来临之前向乌克兰输送 30 亿立方米天然气用于储存。
这一交易既保持了储备，又带来了丰厚的利润。这或许是欧洲大陆未来能源战略的一个缩影 👇。
item.description:
Last year Europe made the unorthodox decision to pump 3bn cubic metres of natural gas to Ukraine for storage ahead of winter.

The trade kept reserves stocked and provided healthy profits. It may be a glimpse at the continent’s future energy strategy econ.st/4bIUdI8 👇

item.title: 生产无排放电力的工艺越来越便宜。但是，为了使电气化成为气候的福音和工业的财富，它需要变得更加多才多艺 👇。
item.description: Processes for producing emissions-free electricity are getting cheaper. But in order for electrification to be a boon for the climate and a bonanza for industry it needs to become more versatile econ.st/3uAxAF8 👇

item.title:
虽然购买通胀保值债券来抵御通胀似乎不无道理，但在最近的通胀肆虐期间，这将是一个非常无利可图的举动。
债券的意义何在？ 👇
item.description:
Although buying inflation-protected bonds to protect against inflation does not seem unreasonable, it would have been a spectacularly unprofitable move during the latest bout of inflation.

What is the point of the bonds? econ.st/49xCzFi 👇

item.title: 中国的半导体供应链正在稳步深化。但它能与竞争对手相媲美吗？ 👇
item.description: China’s semiconductor supply chain is steadily deepening. But can it ever match that of its rivals? econ.st/3HZy8aH 👇

item.title: 过去几年对俄罗斯间谍来说是煎熬的几年。但 @RUSI_org 收集并由《经济学人》发表的证据表明，他们正在从错误中吸取教训，并开始了针对西方的政治战争的新阶段 👇。
item.description: The past few years were torrid for Russian spies. But evidence gathered by @RUSI_org and published by The Economist shows that they are learning from their errors and embarking on a new phase of political warfare against the West econ.st/3wlxDFj 👇

item.title: 去年，Temu 是美国、英国、法国和德国下载量最大的应用程序。Shein已经在美国青少年中引起了购物热潮。但零售商能赢得大批购物者的青睐吗？ 👇
item.description: Last year Temu was the most downloaded app in America, Britain, France and Germany. Shein is already a shopping sensation among American teenagers. But can the retailers win over shoppers en masse? econ.st/3SZiliy 👇
